law.catch_line: Commissioner may adopt rules and regulations.
law.text: The commissioner of insurance shall administer the provisions of KRS 304.18-130 to 304.18-170 and may adopt rules and regulations to implement the provisions of KRS 304.18-130 to 304.18-170.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1301, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 6, effective January 1, 1979.
